articles.title: Missiles hit near Odesa in Ukraine as new Mariupol evacuation bid planned - Reuters.com
articles.description: Ukrainian and European officials expressed outrage on Sunday at what they said were atrocities committed by Russian forces near Kyiv before they withdrew from the region to focus their attacks elsewhere.
articles.content: LVIV/ODESA,Ukraine, April 3 (Reuters) - Ukrainian and European officials expressed outrage on Sunday at what they said were atrocities committed by Russian forces near Kyiv before they withdrew from … [+5829 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Missiles hit fuel storage facilities near Odesa as Russia continues to blockade the Black Sea - ABC News
articles.description: Russian missile strikes hit an oil refinery and three fuel storage facilities that were used by Ukraine to supply its troops, as the European Union vows to document Russian "atrocities" in the International Court of Justice.
articles.content:
Russian attacks have destroyed an oil refinery in Ukraine's central Poltava region and struck "critical infrastructure", most likely a fuel depot, near the port city of Odesa, local officials said.

articles.title: Netherlands to host New Zealand for two T20Is in August - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: It continues NZ's long trip across Europe, following up from tours to England, Scotland and Ireland
